item.title: Quarterly Earnings Review: Dec 2025 Results Show Mixed Trends Across Market Caps
item.description: The December 2025 quarter earnings season has unfolded with a nuanced picture across market capitalisations, as 1,909 companies declared results. While the overall proportion of positive results edged up to 47.0%, mid-cap stocks outperformed with a 53.0% positivity rate, signalling a shift in earnings momentum amid a challenging macroeconomic backdrop. Time: 21 minutes ago

item.title: AU Small Finance Joins Mojo Stocks List Amid Strong Financial Momentum
item.description: AU Small Finance has been added to the prestigious Mojo Stocks list as of 09 February 2026, marking a significant endorsement of its improving fundamentals and growth prospects. Trading at Rs 1,004.7, this mid-cap banking stock has demonstrated robust quarterly performance, signalling its potential as a compelling investment opportunity within the financial sector. Time: 31 minutes ago

item.title: Linde India Q3 FY26: Premium Valuation Tests Investor Patience Despite Strong Operational Performance
item.description: Linde India Ltd., a leading industrial gases and engineering company, reported consolidated net profit of ₹193.33 crores for Q3 FY26, marking a robust 66.21% year-on-year growth from ₹116.32 crores in Q3 FY25. The sequential performance showed equally impressive momentum, with profits rising 13.06% quarter-on-quarter from ₹171.00 crores in Q2 FY26. Despite this strong operational showing, the stock remains under pressure, trading at ₹6,297.75 with a market capitalisation of ₹53,025 crores, as investors grapple with stretched valuation multiples that position it amongst the most expensive stocks in the chemical sector. Time: 49 minutes ago

item.title: Mangal Credit Q3 FY26: Stellar Quarter Masks Valuation Concerns
item.description: Mangal Credit & Fincorp Ltd., a Mumbai-based micro-cap non-banking financial company, has delivered its strongest quarterly performance on record in Q3 FY26, with net sales reaching ₹18.31 crores and net profit climbing to ₹3.83 crores. However, the stock has retreated sharply from its 52-week high of ₹219.30, currently trading at ₹157.35—a decline of 28.25% from peak levels—as investors grapple with stretched valuations and persistent technical weakness. Time: 50 minutes ago

item.title: Neuland Laboratories Q3 FY26: Profit Plunges 60% YoY Despite Revenue Growth
item.description: Neuland Laboratories Ltd., a Hyderabad-based pharmaceutical manufacturer specialising in bulk drugs and active pharmaceutical ingredients, reported a steep decline in profitability for Q3 FY26, with consolidated net profit plummeting 60.06% year-on-year to ₹40.57 crores despite revenue growth of 10.47%. The results, which saw the stock surge 6.53% to ₹13,886.95 following the announcement, reveal a company grappling with margin compression and operational challenges even as it maintains revenue momentum. With a market capitalisation of ₹16,998 crores, the small-cap pharmaceutical player faces critical questions about sustainability of its premium valuation amid deteriorating profitability metrics. Time: 50 minutes ago

item.title: FCS Software Solutions Q3 FY26: Mounting Losses Signal Deepening Operational Crisis
item.description: FCS Software Solutions Ltd. reported a consolidated net loss of ₹1.97 crores for Q3 FY26, marking a staggering deterioration of 256.35% year-on-year from a profit of ₹1.26 crores in Q3 FY25. The micro-cap IT services provider, with a market capitalisation of ₹301.00 crores, saw its stock decline 2.17% to ₹1.80 following the results announcement, extending a brutal downtrend that has eroded 40.00% of shareholder value over the past year. Time: 50 minutes ago

item.title: GSFC Q3 FY26: Profit Slumps 51% QoQ Despite Revenue Resilience
item.description: Gujarat State Fertilizers & Chemicals Ltd. (GSFC) reported a sharp sequential decline in profitability for Q3 FY26, with consolidated net profit plunging 51.23% quarter-on-quarter to ₹158.06 crores from ₹324.07 crores in Q2 FY26. Despite revenue holding relatively steady at ₹2,941.05 crores—down just 7.73% QoQ—the company's bottom line took a significant hit, raising concerns about margin sustainability and operational efficiency in the fertiliser sector. Time: 50 minutes ago

item.title: Embassy Developments Q3 FY26: Mounting Losses Signal Deep Operational Distress
item.description: Embassy Developments Ltd. has reported a consolidated net loss of ₹233.14 crores for Q3 FY26, marking a dramatic deterioration in operational performance and raising serious questions about the company's business model viability. The loss widened by 52.56% quarter-on-quarter from ₹152.82 crores in Q2 FY26, whilst year-on-year comparison shows a staggering 1000.24% decline from a loss of ₹21.19 crores in Q3 FY25. The stock, trading at ₹67.47 with a market capitalisation of ₹9,387 crores, has plunged 54.78% over the past year, reflecting mounting investor concerns about the company's financial trajectory. Time: 50 minutes ago

item.title: HMT Q3 FY26: Mounting Losses Deepen as Revenue Plunges 29% - Survival Concerns Intensify
item.description: HMT Ltd., the once-iconic state-owned industrial manufacturing company, reported a devastating third quarter for FY2026, with net losses widening to ₹27.24 crores—a 46.88% deterioration year-on-year. The Government of India-owned entity, now valued at a mere ₹1,565 crores, continues its downward spiral as revenue collapsed 28.64% to ₹20.83 crores in Q3 FY26, marking the lowest quarterly sales in recent history. With negative shareholder equity of ₹1,897.90 crores and operating margins plummeting to -111.04%, the company's fundamental viability remains in serious question. Time: 50 minutes ago

item.title: ITL Industries Q3 FY26: Steady Growth Amid Challenging Market Conditions
item.description: ITL Industries Ltd., a micro-cap industrial manufacturing company specialising in band saw machines and CNC tube mills, reported a consolidated net profit of ₹2.71 crores for Q3 FY26 (October-December 2025), marking a modest 6.27% sequential increase from ₹2.55 crores in Q2 FY26 and a 17.83% year-on-year gain from ₹2.30 crores in Q3 FY25. Despite this steady operational performance, the stock has remained under severe pressure, currently trading at ₹289.10 with a market capitalisation of just ₹86.00 crores—down 36.46% from its 52-week high of ₹455.00 and reflecting a prolonged bearish trend that began in August 2025. Time: 50 minutes ago

item.title: Are JNK India Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: JNK India Ltd's latest Q2 FY26 results show strong revenue growth of 71.63% year-on-year and a net profit recovery, but profitability metrics like operating margin and return on equity have declined, raising concerns about cost management and cash flow. Overall, while the revenue surge is positive, the mixed performance and reduced institutional confidence suggest caution moving forward. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Are Ceigall India Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Ceigall India Ltd's latest Q3 FY26 results show strong revenue growth of 19.34% year-on-year, reaching ₹991.14 crores, but profitability is under pressure with only a 1.24% increase in net profit and declining margins, raising concerns about operational efficiency and rising costs. Investors should monitor future results for signs of improvement. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Are Muthoot Microfin Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Muthoot Microfin Ltd's latest results show a significant sequential profit recovery, but a year-on-year decline in both net profit and revenue, raising concerns about its financial health amid high leverage and ongoing sector challenges. Overall, while there are signs of improved operational efficiency, the company's performance remains mixed and cautious moving forward. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Are Electronics Mart India Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Electronics Mart India Ltd's latest Q3 FY26 results show strong revenue growth of 21.92% quarter-on-quarter, but net profit declined 11.49% year-on-year, indicating profitability challenges amid rising operational costs and margin compression. Overall, while revenue performance is robust, concerns about debt levels and capital efficiency warrant careful consideration. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Are Enviro Infra Engineers Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Enviro Infra Engineers Ltd's latest results show strong profitability with a net profit growth of 36.93% year-on-year, but revenue has declined sequentially and is below average, indicating potential challenges. Overall, while operational efficiency is improving, revenue volatility and reduced institutional interest suggest caution. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Are Jeena Sikho Lifecare Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Jeena Sikho Lifecare Ltd's latest Q3 FY26 results are strong, with record net sales of ₹221.68 crores and a net profit of ₹66.66 crores, despite a slight contraction in operating margins. While the company shows robust growth and strong financial health, its high valuation may raise concerns. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Are Sansera Engineering Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Sansera Engineering Ltd's latest Q2 FY26 results are strong, featuring record net profit of ₹71.74 crores and revenue growth, despite concerns over valuation and return on equity. Overall, the company shows robust operational performance but investors should be cautious about sustainability. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Are Rajnish Wellness Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Rajnish Wellness Ltd's latest results show strong revenue growth of 93.67% quarter-on-quarter, but the company incurred a net loss of ₹0.91 crores, indicating significant operational challenges and a critical profitability crisis despite the topline increase. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Are Hariom Pipe Industries Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Hariom Pipe Industries Ltd's latest results show strong revenue growth with net sales up 21% year-on-year, but profitability is under pressure, as net profit declined 3.21% compared to last year and operating margins decreased. Overall, the performance is mixed, highlighting challenges in maintaining profitability despite increased sales. Time: 2 hours ago
